eg

Class Projects

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.Projects

  • public class Projects
extends java.lang.Object
    The assigned projects.

    Projets are are represented by objects of ProjectActions.

    A List of assigned projects of which one is set active is mantained. Assigning and retrieving projects as well as changing between listed projects takes place based on the file of the EditableDocument that is selected at a time.

      Opens the window of the SettingsWindow object that belongs to the active project or to one that is changed to
